*Mantella looked herself over* Mantella: I'll test them when a Maxi or a
Pred come in sighting. *Mantella smiled about how this place was. She even
got her own room* *Mantella looked at her new color. She was no longer lime
green but she was sky blue with the same red eyes but she had black spots
pine green stripes and purple claws* Mantella: Woah..I'm psyched out! *After
seeing her color Mantella was dying to check her weapons out. She pulled her
slash claws out and looked then over. They reflected the light off of them
and ridged and have a pointed sharp tip. She would test her other skills out
later. She wouldn't want to scrap the wall paper* Mantella: This is really
great! *Mantella put her slash claws away* Mantella: If you don't mind, sir,
I'll be heading to my room. Call me if a Maxi or a Pred comes in sight.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Dachande85@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 26, 2000 3:50 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Bazooka/Magmatron::
>
>     Bazooka saw Magmatron enter the lab. He didn't have anyone else with
him.
>     "Sir the change is done, Mantella is one of us now." Bazooka said.
>     "Good, our new friend has gone back to his ship for now. It seems to
be
> functional. If he doesn't wish to join us we may have to commandeer his
> ship." Magmatron said. "Where is Bobertron? The sooner he gets here the
> faster this can happen.
>     "Mantella how do you like yourself?" Magmatron asked. "Bazooka go and
> find Bobertron."
>     Bazooka went off to find his comrade.
>     "I think you will find your new abilities useful."
>
